thread.title: 'Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension' gets new spooky trailer
thread.title_full: 'Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension' gets new spooky trailer - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: 'Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension' gets new spooky trailer
text:
A new trailer for "Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension" has surfaced online.
Just like the previously-released trailers, the new trailer carries some terrifying elements such as dark shadows, ghosts and a demonic creature named Toby, reports aceshowbiz.com.
The upcoming horror film follows life of a family, who moves into a new house and finds an old camera which was left behind by the previous residents.
In the spooky house, their daughter Leila (played by Ivy George) is haunted by mysterious creatures that can only be seen with the camera.
The trailer also gives away some never-before-seen footage in which Leila is possessed by a supernatural being.
The film is said to be the "final instalment" of the series which began in 2009. Directed by Gregory Plotkin, the haunting movie will arrive in US theatres on October 23.
 Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension | Online Trailer | Paramount Pictures International
